title: Baked eggs
description: This easy weekend treat can be tweaked to include mushrooms, bacon or spinach. Serve with toast for dipping.

default: additions: ham or mushrooms cooked, drained spinach (optional)

steps: Turn the oven to the highest setting and smear butter over two small ovenproof dishes. Cover with a combination of ham, mushrooms and spinach, if liked.
Crack a couple of eggs over the top, followed by grated cheese, salt and pepper.
